author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Gazprom: new gas plant to need no more than $5 billion in capex
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian gas giant Gazprom said on Friday that the construction of a gas processing complex near the Baltic Sea will require no more than $5 billion in capex.
FILE PHOTO: A flag with the logo of Russian gas giant Gazprom flies in front of Zagorsk Pipe Plant (ZTZ) outside Moscow, Russia May 29, 2017. Picture taken May 29, 2017. REUTERS/Sergei Karpukhin/File Photo The company added that it will allocate a pipeline capacity of 45 billion cubic meters per year for the project.
Reporting by Vladimir Soldatkin; Writing by Gabrielle TÃ©trault-Farber; Editing by Polina Ivanova
